scripts.prepare:arb1: mustache config/arb1.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache config/arb1.json const.template.ts > src/const.ts
scripts.prepare:op: mustache config/optimism.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml; mustache config/optimism.json const.template.ts > src/const.ts
